name: AddHiringTeamMember
description:
Add a user to the hiring team for an application.

Call this tool to add an Ashby user to the hiring team at the application level. Suitable for managing team members in the hiring process. Requires 'candidateWrite' permission.

parameters.name: hiring_team_member_details
parameters.description: A JSON object containing 'applicationId', 'teamMemberId', and 'roleId'. These IDs specify the application, team member, and role for adding to the hiring team.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Ashby API
